ComicInfo.Title: Rats
ComicInfo.Summary: Rats: Domino and Cap'n Kidd join Raader and her pirates as they head back into space. Dodger, Bonnie, J'Rel and Captain Scarlet remain on Earth with the Drakes. Dodger has a lot to learn.
